headline: Why Is ConocoPhillips (COP) Among Diamond Hill Capital’s Top Stock Picks?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Diamond Hill Capital’s Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ConocoPhillips (NYSE:COP) stands against Diamond Hill Capital’s other stock picks.
